extracted_text:
On August 26, 2025, Reliance Industries Ltd. (RIL) was in the news for two significant corporate developments .

UBS resumes coverage on RIL, projects value unlocking

RIL to cooperate with probe into Vantara

Global brokerage firm UBS resumed its coverage of RIL with a "Buy" rating and a price target of ₹1,750 per share.

The positive outlook was based on the "earnings transformation" of the past five years and the expectation of value unlocking. UBS also foresaw that RIL's telecom arm, Jio, would reach "maturity" within 12–18 months, leading to value unlocking.

UBS noted that growth in the retail segment should improve to double digits as business-to-business restructuring concludes and store expansion efforts show results.

The brokerage also expects RIL's new energy business to start contributing to EBITDA from FY27.

BusinessLinereported that Reliance Industries had committed to cooperating with a Supreme Court-mandated Special Investigation Team (SIT) probing the operations of its Vantara wildlife initiative.

The company emphasized its commitment to animal welfare and transparency in the report.
